DOC.brief_summary: In this study, test persons with chronic excessive UV radiation and a control group are examined by multiphoton laser imaging and biophysical methods in order to evaluate the dermal fiber network. We expect to observe signs of advanced skin aging in the test group.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Excessive UV Irradiation on Skin Aging by Multiphoton Laser Imaging and Biophysical Methods
DOC.criteria: non smokers contraception 12 subjects with chronic excessive UV irradiation 12 normal subjects dermatological and other severe disorders pregnancy and lactation dermatological topical therapy internal medication cosmetical intervention at test area
